import pandas as pd
import plotly.plotly as py
import plotly.graph_objs as go
import plotly

source.55f7b622:
# Create traces
variables = data.columns.values
p = []
for i in range(1,len(variables)):
    a = go.Scatter(
        x = data.Date,
        y = data[variables[i]],
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        name = variables[i])
    p.append(a)

#py.iplot(p, filename='line-mode')
